body:
```
[scratlantis:mfem/mfem-3.3/examples] miller86% spack find MFEM
==> No package matches the query: MFEM
[scratlantis:mfem/mfem-3.3/examples] miller86% spack find mfem
==> 1 installed packages.
-- darwin-elcapitan-x86_64 / gcc@6.1.0 --------------------------
mfem@3.3
```
This is happening on an OSX system. Not sure if correct behavior elsewhere.
title: spack find is case sensitive
